description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the boot failure in VMware-based virtualization environments when using an x86-based processor with Secure Boot enabled:

1. Refer to the guidance outlined in KB-5025885 for managing Windows Boot Manager revocations related to Secure Boot changes.
2. Apply any necessary mitigations as specified in the article to restore boot functionality.

**Details**:
- Microsoft is coordinating with VMware to address this issue, so keep an eye on updates from both vendors.
- Ensure that the mitigations do not conflict with other security configurations in your virtualization environment. (LLM Synthesized)
